name: Scythe of the Crow
advancements: Increase shatter by **15%**. After shattering the target's shield, deal burn damage equal to **120%** of ATK to the target every second for **15** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **16%**.
Increase damage dealt by **10%** for each enemy within **6** meters, up to a maximum of **30%**.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.
Increase damage dealt against HP shields or shielded enemies by **100%**.
Increase damage dealt by **10%** for each enemy slain for **30** seconds. Stack up to **3** times.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: While on the ground, swing the scythe to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
breakdown: **104.2%** of ATK + **5**, **strongly suspend** the target, and cause the Wanderer to go airborne.

abilities.name: Rising Scythe
abilities.description: While airborne or after jumping once, attack 5 times in a row.
breakdown: **173.9%** of ATK + **9** and knockdown. The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to **600%** damage.

abilities.name: Asunder
abilities.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (or tap when a target is selected), or tap normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Asunder. While falling, deal damage equal to **12.5%** of ATK + **1** each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **71.9%** of ATK + **4** and deliver a **knockdown**.

The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to **600%** damage.

abilities.name: Returning Chainblade
abilities.description: After the fourth normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger Returning Chainblade. Transform into a chainblade, dealing damage equal to **137.4%** of ATK + **7** to nearby targets and pulling them in.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.description: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then tap normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to **570%** of ATK + **30**.

abilities.name: Returning Chainblade
abilities.description: Tap normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging) to trigger Rapid Lunge. Deal up to **126.9%** of ATK + **7** damage and pull in nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Domain of the Bat
abilities.description: When dodging, summon a group of bats that pulls the target into the center. Tap normal attack during the short period after dodging to swing the scythe, dealing up to **114.3%** of ATK + **6** damage to the target.

abilities.name: Dodge
abilities.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger a Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within an area. Become immune to hitstun for **0.5** seconds while dodging.

abilities.name: Mortal Coil
abilities.description: Swing the scythe, dealing damage equal to **499.9%** of ATK + **26**. Cooldown: **45** seconds.

abilities.name: Flaming Scythe
abilities.description: When ***weapon charge is full*** or ***Phantasia*** is triggered, **remove all debuffs from the wielder** and create a Flaming Scythe upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to **398.3%** of ATK + **21** and lasts for **10** seconds. Additionally, spawn Flaming Scythes every **2** seconds. The scythes summon volcanic eruptions from the ground, which deal damage equal to **66%** of ATK + **3** to targets and suspend them.

recommendedMatrices.name: Shiro
recommendedMatrices.description: Great set for both damage and shatter.

recommendedMatrices.name: KING
recommendedMatrices.description: Decent option if you only use Scythe of the Crow for shield breaking.

recommendedMatrices.name: Crow
recommendedMatrices.description: High damage matrix when you have high crit rate.

recommendedMatrices.name: Sobek
recommendedMatrices.description: A good substitute for SSR damage chips if you don't have them. Very useful against groups of mobs, i.e. in Bygone Phantasm.
